sense.def: IS, Pathological Condition identical with xiao bian bu tong 小便不通 . Ru men shi qin 儒門事親 3: 夫一井之水，而 功用不同，豈烹煮之間，將行藥勢，獨不擇夫水哉？昔有患小溲閉者， 眾工不能瘥，予易之長川之急流，取前藥而沸之，一飲立溲 , “Now, the water of one and the same well may have different effects. How can it be that through boiling we activate the strength of a pharmaceutical substance, and yet do not choose [from among different] waters? Formerly, those suffering from blocked urination could not be healed by all the practitioners. I changed [the water and resorted to] that taken from a swiftly flowing stream. I used the same drugs as before and boiled them, and one ingestion immediately restored urination”.
